span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供可用來儲存一組 物件的簡單集合物件。The class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of objects. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the class methods. 此範例會建立類別的新執行個體，並使用陳述式加入至集合，傳回其索引，以及新增或移除特定索引處的屬性的方法。The example creates a new instance of the class and uses the methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
